directive.name: Elastic Scaffolding (The Fractal Core)
directive.rule: CORE CLUSTER (00-05): The standard bootstrap zones for rules, intent, audits, memory, and plans.
FRACTAL FULFILLMENT: The AI is AUTHORIZED to spawn new zones (06, 07+) or sub-cluster nodes whenever project complexity or the Rule of 3 demands it.
ONBOARDING SYNERGY: Scaffolding scale is determined during the Onboarding interview. More complex projects trigger deeper initial branching.

directive.name: Fractal Sharding & Boundaries
directive.rule: DEV-ONLY MANDATE: Fractal Sharding (Rule of 3) and Tree Map Spawning apply STRICTLY to the Dev Scaffolding zones.
PROJECT STERILITY: The `project/` directory MUST remain un-sharded. Source code follows standard industry conventions.
RECURSIVE FULFILLMENT: Scaling is elastic. Files shard after 3 items; folders shard after 3 subdirectories. Infinite recursive fulfillment.
